name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2'  else '0' end)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: ISCHILD

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END )
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: ISLEAF

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (case when t1.module = '0' then '/' else (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt  WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY	tt.root limit 0,1) end)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: MODULENAME1

queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`,
t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`,
t1.ASSIGNEDTO AS `ASSIGNEDTOPK`,
t1.`BRANCH`,
t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`,
t1.`CHILDSTORIES`,
t1.`CLOSEDBY`,
t1.`CLOSEDDATE`,
t1.`CLOSEDREASON`,
t1.`COLOR`,
t1.`DELETED`,
t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`,
t1.`ESTIMATE`,
t1.`FROMBUG`,
t1.`ID`,
(case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2'  else '0' end) AS `ISCHILD`,
0 AS `ISFAVORITES`,
( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`,
t1.`KEYWORDS`,
t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`,
t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`,
t1.`LINKSTORIES`,
t1.`MAILTO`,
t1.MAILTO AS `MAILTOPK`,
t1.`MODULE`,
t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`,
(case when t1.module = '0' then '/' else (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt  WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) and tt.deleted = '0' AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY	tt.root limit 0,1) end) AS `MODULENAME1`,
t1.`OPENEDBY`,
t1.`OPENEDDATE`,
t1.`PARENT`,
t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`,
t11.`PATH`,
t1.`PLAN`,
t1.`PRI`,
t31.`NAME` AS `PRODOCTNAME`,
t1.`PRODUCT`,
t1.`REVIEWEDBY`,
t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`,
t1.`SOURCE`,
t1.`SOURCENOTE`,
t1.`STAGE`,
t1.`STAGEDBY`,
t1.`STATUS`,
t1.`SUBSTATUS`,
t1.`TITLE`,
t1.`TOBUG`,
t1.`TYPE`,
t1.`VERSION`,
t1.`VERSION` AS `VERSIONC`,
t1.STORYSN
FROM `zt_story` t1 
LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.id
LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.id
LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.id
LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.id
